Package frontend

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • frontend.Console
  • public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
    It deals with the user interface to perform different tasks in the database mediacreate_db
    Author:
    Federico Latorre

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addNewSoftware()
      It adds a new software sales into a selected week by typing its atributes manually one by one
      private void deleteSoftwareByID()  
      private void editSoftware()  
      void launch()  
      private void navigation()
      navigation method: It manages the user interface to select the desired option by choosing it typing the corresponding number
      private void showAllSoftwareSales()
      It prints all the software sales of a selected week without discrimination It uses List interface and lambda functions
      private void showGeneralSoftware()
      It shows all the entries of the "all_software" database It uses List interface and lambda functions
      private void ShowSoftwareByGame()
      It shows the software sales of a desired week pertaining to an specific game by typing said game in the console
      private void showSoftwareById()
      It shows a software sales in a selected week by typing its Id in the console
      private void showSoftwareBySystem()  
      private void updateAllSoftware()
      It copies the software sales of a selected week in to a general database It uses List interface and lambda functions
      private void updateGeneralSoftware()
      It scans all the entries and deletes automatically the ones who have same game and system entries It uses List interface and lambda functions
      private void writeSoftwareData()
      It writes the software sales data into a txt file in the folder sales It uses List interface
